lead_paragraph: EASUM--Donald Boyd. Retired United States Ambassador, 92, died April 16, 2016 in Summit, NJ. Memorial Service on April 30, 10:30am at Crescent Ave. Presbyterian Church, 716 Watchung Ave., Plainfield, NJ. Visit: www.fanwoodmemorial.com for the complete obituary. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  EASUM, DONALD BOYD
